object.name: OFFSCREEN
object.description: OFFSCREEN

object.name: PLAYER
object.description: YOUR CLOTHES ARE BIT DIRTY FROM HIKING THROUGH THE WOODS. ASIDE FROM THAT, YOU'RE FINE.

object.name: FOREST PATH
object.description: THIS IS THE START OF A PATH THAT WINDS NORTH INTO THE FOREST.

object.name: GUARD HUT
object.description: THE HUT IS BARELY LARGE ENOUGH TO PROTECT ONE OR TWO SENTRIES FROM THE ELEMENTS.
object.initialdescription: A DILAPIDATED GUARD HUT STANDS NEARBY.

object.name: INSIDE HUT
object.description: YOU ARE INSIDE THE SMALL GUARD HUT. THE OPEN DOORWAY LEADS OUTSIDE TO THE WEST.

nogo.s: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.
nogo.ne: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.
nogo.nw: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.
nogo.e: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.
nogo.se: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.
nogo.sw: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.
nogo.n: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.
nogo.up: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST.

object.name: TUNNEL ENTRACE
object.description: YOU ARE AT THE MOUTH OF A LARGE, COLLAPSED TUNNEL CUT INTO A STEEP HILLSIDE TO THE NORTH. A DIRT PATH RUNS EAST AND WEST AROUND THE ESCARPMENT AND WINDS SOUTH INTO THE THICK FOREST.

object.name: SOUTHEAST OF HILLSIDE
object.description: YOU ARE ON A DIRT PATH CURVING AROUND THE BASE OF A ROCKY HILLSIDE. THE PATH EXTENDS WEST AND NORTHEAST.

nogo.e: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.se: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.sw: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.

object.name: SOUTHWEST OF HILLSIDE
object.description: YOU ARE ON A DIRT PATH CURVING AROUND THE BASE OF A ROCKY HILLSIDE. THE PATH EXTENDS BACK TO THE EAST.

nogo.s: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.w: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.se: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.sw: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.n: THE PATH DEADENDS HERE AT THE HILLSIDE.

object.name: EASTERN HILLSIDE
object.description: YOU ARE ON THE EASTERN EDGE OF A ROCKY HILLSIDE. A LARGE,DARK TUNNEL EXTENDS WESTWARD INTO THE HILLSIDE. ALTHOUGH IT APPEARS ATTEMPTS WERE MADE TO DEMOLISH IT, IT MAY BE POSSIBLE TO CLIMB OVER THE DEBRIS. A DIRT PATH EXTENDS SOUTHWEST.

nogo.ne: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.e: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.se: THE TANGLED WOODS ARE IMPASSIBLE IN THAT DIRECTION.
nogo.n: THE PATH DEADENDS HERE AT THE HILLSIDE.

object.name: TOP OF DEBRIS
object.description: YOU ARE ONTOP OF A LARGE ROCK PILE JUST INSIDE THE MOUTH OF A LARGE TUNNEL. TO THE WEST, THE PILE DROPS PRECIPITOUSLY INTO THE DARKESS.

nogo.up: YOU HIT YOUR HEAD THE ROOF OF THE TUNNEL.

object.name: EAST TUNNEL
object.description: YOU ARE AT THE EASTERN END OF AN EAST-WEST TUNNEL. TO THE EAST, A HUGE DEBRIS PILE, THE RESULT OF INTENTIONAL DEMOLITION, COMPLETELY BLOCKS THE EXIT.

nogo.e: THE GIANT DEBRIS PILE BLOCKS THE EXIT.
nogo.up: THE DEBRIS PILE IS TOO STEEP.

object.name: TUNNEL JUNCTION
object.description: YOU ARE AT A TUNNEL JUNCTION. TUNNELS EXTEND EAST, WEST, AND SOUTH.

object.name: SMALL OFFICE
object.description: THIS IS A SMALL OFFICE AREA. DOORWAYS LEADS NORTH AND SOUTH. A STORAGE CLOSEST IS TO THE EAST.

object.name: BATHROOM
object.description: THIS IS A DANK LAVATORY. A DOORWAY LEADS NORTH.

nogo.s: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NOTRH.
nogo.w: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NOTRH.
nogo.ne: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NOTRH.
nogo.nw: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NOTRH.
nogo.e: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NOTRH.
nogo.se: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NOTRH.
nogo.sw: THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NOTRH.

object.name: DOOR
object.description: THE DOOR SPORTS A LARGE LOCK.

object.name: STORAGE ROOM
object.description: THIS IS A CRAMPED STORAGE CLOSET. A DOOR LEADS WEST.

object.name: DOWNWARD SLOPING TUNNEL
object.description: THIS IS A LONG EAST-WEST TUNNEL THAT SLOPES DOWNWARD TOWARD THE WEST. A SMALLER TUNNEL EXTENDS TO THE NORTH.

object.name: FOUR WAY JUNCTION
object.description: THIS IS A FOUR WAY JUNCTION. PASSAGES LEAD NORTH, SOUTH, EAST AND WEST.

object.name: SOUTH TUNNEL
object.description: THIS IS A LARGE, NORTH-SOUTH TUNNEL THAT ENDS ABRUPTLY WHERE IT HAS COLLAPSED. SCORCH MARKS WOULD SUGGEST THE TUNNEL ENTRANCE WAS DESTROYED DELIBERATELY. THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NORTH.

nogo.s: THE TUNNEL STOPS ABRUPTLY WHERE IT WAS INTENTIONALLY DYNAMITED.

object.name: VAST WORKHALL
object.description: YOU HAVE ENTERED A VAST SUBTERANEAN WORKHALL CARVED OUT OF THE NATIVE LIMESTONE. IT WAS APPARENTLY GUTTED OF EQUIPMENT BEFORE IT WAS ABANDONED. THERE IS AN EXIT TO THE SOUTH.

object.name: PUMP ROOM
object.description: THIS IS A SMALL CHAMBER HOUSING WHAT APPEARS TO BE A LARGE, ELECTRICALLY POWERED, WATER PUMP. THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE SOUTH.

object.name: FLOODED TUNNEL
object.description: THIS IS A LOW POINT IN THE MAIN E-W TUNNEL.

nogo.w: THE RISING WATER BLOCKS YOUR PATH.
nogo.nw: THE RISING WATER BLOCKS YOUR PATH.
nogo.sw: THE RISING WATER BLOCKS YOUR PATH.

object.name: LARGE CHAMBER
object.description: THIS IS A LARGE CHAMBER. THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE NORTHEAST.

object.name: BASE OF SHAFT
object.description: THIS IS THE BASE OF A VENTILATION SHAFT. RUNGS ANCHORED INTO THE CONCRETE LEAD UP, WHILE AN EXIT LEADS TO THE SOUTHEAST.

nogo.s: THE ONLY EXITS ARE UP AND SOUTHEAST.
nogo.w: THE ONLY EXITS ARE UP AND SOUTHEAST.
nogo.e: THE ONLY EXITS ARE UP AND SOUTHEAST.
nogo.n: THE ONLY EXITS ARE UP AND SOUTHEAST.

object.name: ON LADDER
object.description: YOU ARE ON A LADDER HALF-WAY UP A VENTILATION SHAFT.

nogo.up: AS YOU ATTEMPT TO CLIMB THE LADDER, WASPS BEGIN TO SWARM AROUND YOU, FORCING YOU BACK DOWN.

object.name: TOP OF SHAFT
object.description: YOU ARE AT THE TOP OF A VENTILATION SHAFT. A METAL CUPOLA, HELD IN PLACE BY LARGE BOLTS, CAPS THE SHAFT.

nogo.up: THE METAL CUPOLA IS IN YOUR WAY.

object.name: TOP OF HILL
object.description: YOU ARE STANDING ATOP A HIGH ESCARPMENT. IN THE DISTANCE, THE GOTHIC SPIRES OF PRAGUE ARE JUST BARELY VISIBLE. AN AIRSHAFT LEADS DOWN INTO AN ABANDONED FACTORY COMPLEX.

object.name: PILE OF LEAVES
object.initialdescription: A PILE OF DAMP LEAVES, BLOWN IN BY THE WIND, LIES ON THE GROUND.

object.name: TABLE
object.initialdescription: THERE IS A LARGE TABLE IN THE CENTER OF THE ROOM.

object.name: RUBBER STAMP
object.description: THE DATE ON THE STAMP IS SET TO MARCH 10TH, 1945.
object.initialdescription: A RUBBER STAMP, USED FOR POSTMARKING MAIL, LIES ON THE TABLE.

object.name: LOCK
object.description: THE METAL LOCK INSET INTO THE DOOR.

object.name: FLASHLIGHT
object.description: THE FLASHLIGHT IS RUSTED SHUT, BUT OTHERWISE OK.
object.initialdescription: A DISCARDED FLASHLIGHT LIES ON THE GROUND.

object.name: WHITE CUBE
object.description: THE CUBE IS ABOUT ONE FOOT ON EACH SIDE. EMBOSSED IN THE SIDE IS THE WORD 'NATRIUM'.
object.initialdescription: A LARGE WHITE CUBE SITS ON A SHELF.

object.name: FILTHY TOILET
object.description: THE INSIDE OF THE BOWL IS CHARRED. IT APPEARS IT WAS USED AS A PLACE TO BURN DOCUMENTS.
object.initialdescription: A FILTHY TOILET SITS IN THE CORNER.

object.name: CHARRED PAPERS
object.description: THE CHARRED PAPERS HAVE TURNED INTO A UNPLEASANT GUNK AS A RESULT OF THE CAVE'S HIGH HUMIDITY.

object.name: CIGARETTE LIGHTER
object.description: THE METAL LIGHTER IS ADORNED WITH A RAISED EAGLE HOLDING A WREATH.
object.initialdescription: A FORGOTTEN CIGARETTE LIGHTER LIES ON THE GROUND.

object.name: WATER
object.initialdescription: RISING WATER BLOCKS THE WESTERN END OF THE TUNNEL.

object.name: STEEL HELMET
object.description: THE GERMAN HELMET IS HEAVILY RUSTED. THE INSIDE WEBBING HAS DETERIORATED.
object.initialdescription: A RUSTING HELMET LIES ON THE GROUND.

object.name: MACHINE
object.initialdescription: A LARGE MACHINE WITH NUMEROUS PIPES RUNNING THROUGH IT OCCUPIES MOST OF THE ROOM.

object.name: BATTERY
object.description: THERE IS A SMALL HOLE IN THE TOP. A WINDOW ON THE SIDE REVEALS IT IS OUT OF ELECTROLYTE.
object.initialdescription: A LARGE, WET CELL BATTERY, WIRED TO THE MACHINERY, LIES ON THE FLOOR.

object.name: CUPOLA
object.description: THE CUPOLA IS A SMALL, RAISED STEEL DOME.

object.name: WRENCH
object.initialdescription: A RUSTED WRENCH LIES ON THE FLOOR.

object.name: NOSE
object.description: YOUR NOSE IS FINE. STOP WORRYING ABOUT IT.

object.name: SUN
object.description: THE SUN IS HIDDEN BEHIND THE GRAY OVERCAST.

object.name: VOLT METER
object.description: THE NEEDLE INDICATES ZERO VOLTAGE.
object.initialdescription: A VOLTMETER, WIRED TO THE BATTERY, IS AFFIXED TO THE WALL.

object.name: WOODEN CRATE
object.description: THE WOODEN CRATE IS NAILED SHUT.
object.initialdescription: A LARGE WOODEN CRATE SITS IN THE CENTER OF THE CHAMBER.

object.name: SPLINTERED WOOD
object.description: THE FORMER WOODEN CRATE IS NOW SMASHED.
object.initialdescription: A PILE OF BROKEN WOOD (FORMERLY A CRATE), IS HERE.

object.name: GOLD BARS
object.description: OOOOH...SHINY!
object.initialdescription: SHINY GOLD BARS LIE ON TOP OF THE SMASHED CRATE.

object.name: CREVICE
object.description: THE GAP IS TOO DARK TO SEE INTO.

object.name: BOLTS
object.description: THE RUSTED BOLTS ARE SECURING THE CUPOLA IN PLACE.

object.name: DEBRIS
object.description: THE DEBRIS PILE CONTISTS OF CONCRETE AND LARGE ROCKS - A RESULT OF THE TUNNEL BEING INTENTIONALLY DYANMITED.

object.name: FOREST
object.description: THE FOREST IS A TANGLED MASS OF THICKETS AND ELDERY DECIDUOUS TREES.

routines.routine: printl("THE CREVICE IS TOO DARK TO SEE INTO.");
println("THE SALTY CAVE WATER TASTES UNPLEASANT.");
println("AAAAARRRRRRR.");
println("YOU CAN'T UNBOLT THAT.");
println("YOU CAN'T TURN THAT ON.");
println("REAL MATURE.");
printl("TIME PASSES...");
printl("YOU HAVE A STRANGE SENSE OF HUMOR.");
printl("YOU HAVE A STRANGE SENSE OF HUMOR.");
printl("YOU HAVE A STRANGE FASCINATION WITH FLUSHING THINGS.");
printl("THERE ARE BETTER WAYS TO WASTE TIME.");
printl("SELF IMMOLATION NEVER SOLVED ANYTHING.");
printl("ARE YOU SOME SORT OF ARSONIST?");
printl("YOU CAN'T PICK THAT.");
printl("THERE ARE FAR BETTER SOUVENIRS TO BE FOUND DOWN HERE.");
printl("THERE ARE SEVERAL ENTERTAINING WAYS TO DIE IN THIS ADVENTURE...NO NEED TO SPEED THINGS ALONG.");
printl("THE KEY HAS LONG SINCE BEEN LOST.");
println("YOU HEAR NOTHING UNEXPECTED.");
println("YOU SMELL NOTHING UNEXPECTED.");
printl("IT WON'T FIT.");
printl("THE LIGHTER SPARKS MOMENTARILY.");
printl("I DON'T KNOW HOW TO DO THAT.");
printl("THAT'S NOT PART OF A HEALTHY DIET.");
printl("YOU TRY IT ON, DECIDE IT LOOK REDICILOUS, THEN TAKE IT OFF.");
println("TRY THE VERB 'UP'.");
println("EATING THAT MUCH SALT WOULD GIVE YOU HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE.");
println("I DON'T KNOW HOW TO DO THAT.");
